EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Account - Final Steps (1383770550.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Account - Final Steps (1383770550.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Doug, I received your I-9 via mail today, thank you so much for sending it. Unfortunately, it will not pass E-Verify/ USCIS requirements as is. The notary needs to sign and date section 2 of the form, on the version you sent me they signed on the back. I have attached a copy of an example I-9 that shows exactly what we need in order to move forward. I am truly sorry for this inconvenience; I know this is a pain. Perhaps when you have the new completed document you can email it or fax it to me instead of sending US mail to expedite the process. I also still need a copy of the fully executed agreement and for you to complete your MBO Access profile (instructions below). Thanks Doug – I am so looking forward to getting your account active so we can bill your customer! Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Monday, November 04, 2013 12:57 PM To: 'quilldogdea@gmail.com' Subject: MBO Account - Final Steps Importance: High Hi Doug, Your account is almost ready! The last step is logging into MBO Access <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ80RlRFuyRc4dE%5F%5FR9DEyzUTexg67XKZhHdekjmsR567qkhU0xj46EunLVMB0CS0FYZx6zUac0vQrrI5EUblqq4HzYDLMWyQUSpKk94bygR7rkq12H20%5Fq2D6ZGVt68OyWzwyTOK9iteMopnsAylwKSePuzQ3fz78o8DILzcJ9j046%5FcZHAt1R7UqeZxzJtI31efFtW%2DC4krCj5P56WRc2gdQASmWJLmqEIYCaKhRk9TCtghwdCytsKxZJIMkAwiq9n2FzVrZTG2by3g%2C%2C/1gwVMIfFNB5YtkRz%2DO%5FXL6vijzTSbpatqa8zCvjrnZAz0lxBZuPEZRP3vfJ6JpgRZOKsMBclB4k08BlcMLafUo1k8NdeXnW%5FTRfRl5iPPaBbWoJGz9hIyo%2DM2WwwrZjRthmfLQ%2C%2C> and completing the “Industry Expertise” and “Disciplines” sections of your profile. This information needed for our workmen’s comp. policy and must be completed before I can activate your account and get you billing. Your user ID and password is the same as your MBO Business Center. I will also need a copy of your fully executed agreement with your customer. I can only find your signed copy in my records. I am also waiting on your I-9 form which I believe you sent via mail. Please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ80RlRFuyRc4dE%5F%5FR9DEyzUTexg67XKZhHdekjmsR567qkhU0xj46EunLVMB0CS0FYZx6zUac0vQrrI5EUblqq4HzYDLMWyQUSpKk94bygR7rkq12H20%5Fq2D6ZGVt68OyWzwyTOK9iteMopnsAylwKSePuzQ3fz78o8DILzcJ9j046%5FcZHAt1R7UqeZxzJtI31efFtW%2DC4krCj5P56WRc2gdQASmWJLmqEIYCaKhRk9TCtghwdCytsKxZJIMkAwiq9n2FzVrZTG2by3g%2C%2C/0xkILICQIUJaukly7tyUIKb9nifUdJ26qPJ%2DBvq538Qq5lxxebGdIHTOo%2DlbP5M5V9iLNBYJRqB0xCYOEM6YWIpi%2DaBpBlSedizG1fP3eqZ4RKdq9fRG1qmp7WdA%2DfnHwXg%2C>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ80RlRFuyRc4dE%5F%5FR9DEyzUTexg67XKZhHdekjmsR567qkhU0xj46EunLVMB0CS0FYZx6zUac0vQrrI5EUblqq4HzYDLMWyQUSpKk94bygR7rkq12H20%5Fq2D6ZGVt68OyWzwyTOK9iteMopnsAylwKSePuzQ3fz78o8DILzcJ9j046%5FcZHAt1R7UqeZxzJtI31efFtW%2DC4krCj5P56WRc2gdQASmWJLmqEIYCaKhRk9TCtghwdCytsKxZJIMkAwiq9n2FzVrZTG2by3g%2C%2C/1gwVMM7QNEZOogl76fOJI7v5kTDSadartLEyVvrtxvAq1kMjIPT6GWrVgvBQF6ADcNyKGFcgBpRLlgZ2F8SfXoMVzvhIJ2%2DlYW6trbTxWbhdaJ1G%2D%2Dhg852inTMh746m> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ80RlRFuyRc4dE%5F%5FR9DEyzUTexg67XKZhHdekjmsR567qkhU0xj46EunLVMB0CS0FYZx6zUac0vQrrI5EUblqq4HzYDLMWyQUSpKk94bygR7rkq12H20%5Fq2D6ZGVt68OyWzwyTOK9iteMopnsAylwKSePuzQ3fz78o8DILzcJ9j046%5FcZHAt1R7UqeZxzJtI31efFtW%2DC4krCj5P56WRc2gdQASmWJLmqEIYCaKhRk9TCtghwdCytsKxZJIMkAwiq9n2FzVrZTG2by3g%2C%2C/1gwVMM7QNENcs0Jk%2Df2VbKTvkCXBaIymvq5uR%5FTp34As3E57YP7ONAz%5FmtxWDpM%5FOvvDAg0eF5UnzQdMJfSad90S4sB8IHu4ezr0spDPWplXJIRm2Os39Yao%5FGonqYi2n0ngJ1g3FSNBcS2rXKw5rQjAGZEvagTCqV%2DEZqM%2C> to MBO Partners!
